configuration.applicationInformation:
Welcome to Scenarioo!


You can change this welcome message and all other settings of Scenarioo on the configuration page.

Please put your application specific welcome message to your users of Scenarioo here. This is the place where you might want to explain the appication specific structure of your Scenarioo documentation, such that new users of this tool will quickly find their way through the user scenarios of your application.

Usually, to start exploring the features of Scenarioo, it's best to choose one of the example use cases and then one of its scenarios to browse step by step through the pages, screenshots and other details of one tested user scenario.

Have fun!
